trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> objects.
All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> have an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> named <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>.
All objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> have an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> named <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>.

However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> rather than direct <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> objects.
This is because <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> does not support a default public constructor.

Therefore, the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> class using the items in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>.
The collection whose items are copied to the new <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The binding to add to the collection.
Always returns 0.
This deviates from the standard <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> implementation for `Add`, which should return the index where the new item was added to the collection.
inputBinding is `null`.
Adds the items of the specified <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> to the end of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>
The collection of items to add to the end of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
Removes all items from this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> is in this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>
The binding to locate in the collection.
`true` if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> is in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies all of the items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The array into which the collection is copied.
The index position in inputBindings at which copying starts.
inputBindings is `null`.
index is less than 0.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> items in this collection.
The number of items in the collection.
Gets an enumerator that iterates through this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The enumerator for this collection.
Searches for the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> in his <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The object to locate in the collection.
The index of the first occurrence of value, if found; otherwise, –1.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> into this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index at which to insert inputBinding.
The binding to insert.
inputBinding is `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never a fixed size; therefore, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> always returns `false`.
`true` if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> is read-only.
An <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> is never read-only; therefore, <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> always returns `false`.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
`true` if the collection is thread safe; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> at the specified index.
The position in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> from this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The binding to remove.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> at the specified index of this <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBinding"></xref> to remove.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
A zero-based <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The first position in the specified <xref href="System.Array"></xref> to receive the copied contents.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextEffectCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which to insert the <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to insert into the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection"></xref>.
